item.title: Hadi murder chargesheet on Jan 7, says home advisor
item.description: Home Advisor Jahangir Alam Chowdhury has said the final chargesheet in the murder case of Inqilab Moncho convenor Sharif Osman bin Hadi will be submitted on Jan 7.
